title: FS - Pirate Cigarette Pack w/ Slide
author: canjond

posts.post_title: FS - Pirate Cigarette Pack w/ Slide
posts.post_content:
I recently upgraded the Pirate slide and shell pack in my collection, so I have this duplicate available for sale.  Really nice condition with its inner slide and also retains its original foil wrapping inside.  Would display very well with a T215!

SOLD shipped PPFF/check.
